attributes.action: Change the vaccination protocol to include other front line workers
attributes.additional_details: Because their current policy has forgotten these front line workers.
attributes.background: Add Teachers, Police Officers and Ambulance staff to be in the first wave of Covid-19 vacinations.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316

Prioritise COVID-19 vaccines for first responders (police, fire, ambulance): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564155

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
